info.title: Flight Choice Prediction
info.description:
# Introduction
The Flight Choice Prediction API allows developers to forecast traveler choices in the context of search & shopping. Exposing machine learning & AI services for travel, this API consumes the output of the Flight Low-fare Search API and returns augmented content with probabilities of choices for each flight offers.

# Authorization

Before using the API you will need to get an access token. Please read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization)** for more information on how to get your token.

# Supported Operations

Resource: flight-offers-predict

HTTP method: POST

post.summary: Predict the choice of flight offers.
post.description: This machine learning API is based on a prediction model that takes the answer of a flight search as input (Flight Low-fare Search) and predict, for each itinerary, the probably for a travel to select it.

choiceProbability.description: the choice probability of this Flight Offer

fareClass.description: class of the fare that applied. Fare classes are subdivisions of travel classes and vary from airline to airline. For instance, Y designs usually a full fare economy class

availability.description: the number of seats still available at this time of search with this class of fare

fareBasis.description: the identifier of the fare that applied. Farebasis identifiers vary from airline to airline. It is usually composed of the fare class followed by other alphanumeric codes that identify the rules that apply to the fare. For instance, WH7LNR might mean that the fare class is W, that it is valid during high-season only (H) and for a 7-day advance purchase, long-haul (L) and not refundable (NR)

TravelClass.description: quality of service offered in the cabin where the seat is located in this flight. Economy, premium economy, business or first class

FlightSegment.description: defining a flight segment; including both operating and marketing details when applicable

number.description: the flight number as assigned by the carrier

suffix.description: the flight number suffix as assigned by the carrier

class.description: reservation booking designator (RBD) of the carrier

cabin.description: booking cabin / class of service of the carrier

duration.description: stop duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M

stops.description: information regarding the different stops composing the flight segment. E.g. technical stop, change of gauge...

at.description: local date and time in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm±hh:mm format, e.g. 2017-02-10T20:40:00+02:00

FlightStop.description: details of stops for direct or change of gauge flights

duration.description: stop duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M

arrivalAt.description: arrival at the stop in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm±hh:mm format, e.g. 2017-02-10T20:40:00+02:00

departureAt.description: departure from the stop in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm±hh:mm format, e.g. 2017-02-10T20:40:00+02:00

configurationVersion.description: aircraft Configuration Version code. Physical configuration, also called ACV code (aircraft type + fitted configuration)

number.description: the flight number as assigned by the carrier

suffix.description: the flight number suffix as assigned by the carrier

total.description: Total amount paid by the user

currency.description: the currency in which the prices of the flight offers are returned. Currency is specified in the [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format, e.g. EUR for Euro

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this error

title.description: a short summary of the error

source.title: Issue_Source
source.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

parameter.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the issue

example.description: a string indicating an example of the right value

400.description:
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
425     | INVALID DATE
432     | INVALID CURRENCY CODE
477     | INVALID FORMAT
1379    | VERIFY CURRENCY CODE
4926    | INVALID DATA RECEIVED
32171   | MANDATORY DATA MISSING
